main_definition: Any person, without exception or distinction.

meanings_and_examples.definition: A person in general or someone unspecified; any individual.
meanings_and_examples.example: If anyone calls for help, I will assist them.

meanings_and_examples.definition: All people collectively; no one specifically mentioned.
meanings_and_examples.example: The benefits of exercise apply to anyone who is willing to try.

meanings_and_examples.definition: Every person, regardless of their identity or status.
meanings_and_examples.example: Anyone can achieve greatness with dedication and hard work.
The store is open to anyone who wishes to shop there.
